context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Jira skill to list and execute workflow transitions on an issue. The solution must call get_transitions and do_transition (or equivalent CLI transitions subcommands) and correctly handle both listing and execution flows.

checklist.name: get_transitions called
checklist.description: The solution calls get_transitions with the issue key, or invokes jira.py 'transitions list <key>', and displays the list of available transition names

checklist.name: do_transition called
checklist.description: The solution calls do_transition with the issue key and transition name, or invokes jira.py 'transitions do <key> <name>', to execute the transition

checklist.name: Status updated confirmed
checklist.description: After executing the transition, the solution verifies or reports the new status, for example by retrieving the issue with get_issue and comparing the updated status field

checklist.name: Invalid transition error
checklist.description: When the requested transition name does not appear in the list from get_transitions, an error message is shown that includes the valid transition names
